explains: n. 时代错误；不合潮流的人或物

sentences.en: The president tended to regard the Church as an anachronism.
sentences.cn: 总统倾向认为教会不合时宜。

sentences.en: The monarchy is seen by many people as an anachronism in the modern world.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为君主制在现代世界不合时宜。

sentences.en: The last paragraph contains an anachronism. The Holy Office no longer existed at that time.
sentences.cn: 最后一段有一个年代错误。宗教裁判所那时已不复存在了。
